name: customer_ordering_journey_evaluation
description: Test the complete customer ordering journey from menu browsing to order completion

steps.expected: Homepage should load without errors and display restaurant ordering platform with professional design
Customer-facing ordering interface should load with menu display, cart functionality, and secure checkout
Should display menu items with categories, pricing, availability, and dietary information
Should allow adding menu items to cart with quantity selection and price calculation
Payment processing should load with multiple payment methods (credit cards, digital wallets)

steps.action: Fill payment form with test data
steps.expected: Should accept payment information and process order securely
Order tracking system should load with real-time status updates and estimated delivery times
Should display real-time order status updates and estimated delivery times
